articles.author: Adrienne Klasa
articles.title: Tod's plans to delist from Milan stock exchange - Financial Times
articles.description: Italian luxury group agrees deal to go private with LVMH-backed private equity firm L Catterton
articles.content:
Italian luxury bag and shoemaker Tods plans to go private in a deal with LVMH-backed private equity firm L Catterton, ending more than two decades as a public company on the Milan stock exchange.

articles.title: The Body Shop set to appoint administrators in UK - BBC.com
articles.description: The retailer is expected to undergo a major restructure, leading to shop closures and job losses.
articles.content:
By Dearbail JordanBusiness reporter, BBC News
The Body Shop's UK business is set to appoint administrators this week, in a move likely to result in shop closures and job losses.

articles.title: Year of the dragon: We have entered the AI age - VentureBeat
articles.description: Like the Year of the Dragon roaring in today, 2024 will mark the year where AI is applied in real, tangible ways.
